title: Donald Trump salutes North Korean general
shortDescription: It's a real footage of Trump visiting Singapore on June 14, 2018
longDescription: Trump reached out to shake the general's hand, and the general responded with a salute. Trump reciprocated, saluting the general back before the men shook hands. The video ran over and over on North Korean state television with an enthusiastic anchor track. Social media exploded with outrage about Trump's salute. More details at: https://www.nbcnews.com/news/north-korea/new-video-shows-president-trump-saluting-north-korean-general-n883076
